name: XQueueMaileonShopware6

infos.name: XQueue Maileon Newslettermanagement for Shopware 6
infos.description:
Produktinformationen

Maileon ist eine E-Mail-Marketing- und Automatisierungslösung, mit der Sie zielgerichtete E-Mail-Kampagnen an Ihre Kunden versenden sowie Marketing-Automation-Strecken für Ihre Kunden entwickeln können. Profitieren Sie von zahlreichen leistungsstarken Funktionen wie personalisierten Versandzeitpunkten, unserer Recommendation Engine, AMP Mailing Unterstützung, Landing Page Editoren und vielem mehr. Vom Kleinunternehmen bis zum Großkonzern - Maileon bietet Ihnen mit bis zu 100 Millionen E-Mails/Stunde volle Skalierbarkeit für Ihr E-Mail-Marketing.  


Für namhafte Kunden sind wir bereits E-Mail-Marketing Tool Anbieter Nr.1 in Deutschland. Lassen auch Sie sich von unser langjährigen Erfahrung im E-Mail-Marketing und unseren hohen Standards überzeugen.


Sie haben noch kein Maileon-Konto? Jetzt kostenlos unter https://www.maileon.de/maileon-testen testen!


Ihre Vorteile durch das Shopware Plugin von Maileon


Das Shopware Plugin verbindet unsere E-Mail-Marketing-Lösung direkt mit Ihrem Shopware Onlineshop. Anschließend werden automatisch alle wichtigen Kundendaten wie Newsletter-Anmeldungen- und Abmeldungen sowie DOI Bestätigungen aktualisiert und ergänzt. Vermeiden Sie manuelle Im- und Exportfehler und sparen Sie gleichzeitig wertvolle Zeit und Nerven. 


Profitieren Sie von

  •  Automatischer Snchronisation von Newsletter-Anmeldern nach Maileon
  • Automatischer Synchronisation von Newsletter-Abmeldungen aus Maileon an Shopware
  • Automatischer Synchronisation von DOI Bestätigungen 
  • Transaktionsmailings bei Änderungen der Bestellungen über das Backend/Plugins oder per API 
  • Optionalen Versendungen von Bestellbestätigungen
  • Eigenem Konfigurationspanel direkt in Shopware
  • Möglichkeit zur Einsicht und Synchronisation aktueller Newsletter Anmelder / Abmelder in der Maileon Webapp
infos.shortDescription: Mit Maileon erstellen Sie ganz einfach professionelle Newsletter Kampagnen, Marketing Automation Strecken oder Double-Opt-In Mailings für Ihre Shopware-Store Kunden.
infos.highlights:
Automatische Kontaktsynchronisierung
Rechtssicherer Versand von Double-Opt-In Mails
Transaktionsmailings
Eigenes Konfigurationspanel
Maileon Webapp
infos.features:
Newsletter Drag & Drop Editor
Personalisierte Versandzeitpunkte
Recommendation Engine
Landingpage Editor
Marketing Automation 
AMP Mailings
A/B-Tests
Mailing Analysen
Dynamische Inhalte
Web-Formulare
Rückläufer Management
Medienbibliothek
Drip-Kampagnen
Vorlagen Management
Smart Content

infos.name: XQueue Maileon Newslettermanagement
infos.description:
Product Information

Maileon is an email marketing and automation solution that allows you to send targeted email campaigns to your customers and develop marketing automations. Benefit from numerous powerful features such as personalized sending times, our recommendation engine, AMP mailing support, landing page editors and much more. From small businesses to large corporations - Maileon offers full scalability for your email marketing with up to 100 million emails/hour. 


For illustrious customers are already the No.1 e-mail marketing tool provider in Germany. Allow us to convince you by our many years of experience in e-mail marketing and our high standards.


You do not have a Maileon account yet? Test it for free now! See https://www.maileon.de/maileon-testen


Your Advantages with the Shopware Plugin for Maileon


The Maileon Shopware plugin connects our email marketing solution directly to your Shopware online shop. All important customer data such as newsletter subscriptions and cancellations as well as DOI confirmations are automatically updated and added. Avoid manual import and export errors while saving valuable time. 


Benefit From

  • Automatic synchronization of newsletter subscribers to Maileon 
  • Automatic synchronization of newsletter unsubscribers from Maileon to Shopware
  • Automatic synchronization of DOI confirmations
  • Transactional mailings for order changes via the backend/plugins or via API  
  • Optional sending of order confirmations
  • Configuration panel directly in Shopware
  • Possibility to view and synchronize current newsletter subscribers / unsubscribers in the Maileon webapp
infos.shortDescription: This plugin is used to synchronize newsleter recipients between Shopware an Maileon  and optionally to send transactional mails, like order confirmations, using Maileon.
infos.highlights:
Automatic contact synchronization
Legally secure sending of Double-Opt-In mailings
Transactional mailings
Configuration panel
Maileon webapp
infos.features:
Newsletter Drag & Drop Editor
Personalized sending times
Recommendation Engine
Landingpage Editor
Marketing Automations
AMP Mailings
A/B-Tests
Mailing Reportings
Dynamic Content
Web Forms
Return Management
Media Library
Drip-Campaigns
Template Management
Smart Content

changelog.text: Improve abandoned cart functionality
• Change order state name to order state technical name

• Added new functionality: Send language code with DOI key 
  • Added a button to Maileon Plugin page, to create transaction types at Maileon
Bugfix: added filters for language when generating product url for transactions
Compatibility updates for Shopware 6.5
Improve abandoned cart functionality

• Bugfix, also filters for language when generating product url
  • Change order state name to order state technical name

• Added new functionality: Send language code with DOI key 
  • Added a button to Maileon Plugin page, to create transaction types at Maileon
• Added functionality: Resend DOI mail if the subscriber has already subscribed and subscribe again
• Bugfix: Error in orderconfirm when categories first was empty
• Custom fields can be submitted to Maileon on the NL subscription form

• Changed version schema: 1.0.11 => 1.1.0, as 1.0.11 was first version with new plugin schema
  • Re-Added missing library
Fixed problem when a certain combination of settings caused a second DOI to be triggered, as soon as Maileon notified Shopware about the confirmation.

• When submitting an order contact event, submit multiple customer details in contact fields.
  • Submit product properties in contact fields when submitting an order contact event.
  • When submitting an order contact event, submit product properties in the contact event fields.
  • Added customfields „shopware_count_orders”, „shopware_count_total”, „shopware_last_order” and „shopware_last_order_datetime” that are updated when a order is complete (and reflect only values of completed orders)

• Change Maileon API PHP library to composer version
  • Add product url in order confirmation and abandoned carts transactions
  • Add one transaction per purchased item to order confirm
  • Bugfix: Abandoned cart job threw Exception when customer_id was empty
Fixed administration JS to work with Shopware 6.4.7

• Add order.categories and order.brands to order confirmation transaction
Add functionality to add separate Maileon permission for buyers
  • Plugin config works with different Sales Channels
  • Fixed not being able to send transactions using PHP 8+

• Updated API and controller logic to work with Shopware 6.4.x
  • Added parameter 'hash' to DOI confirmation webhook

• Update of controllers and buttons of the plugin settings for compatibility with SW 6.3.5


Hint: Please deactivate and reactivate the plugin after updating the plugin.

- Update for Shopware 6.3

- Added custom field shopware_store_id for subscribers

- Added test button for API configuration

• Changes for release at shop
  • Added abandoned carts functionality
  • Improve transaction types to standardization
